articles.title: Gabon coup: Military chief says suspension of democracy only 'temporary' - BBC
articles.description: Gabon's main opposition accuses the military of showing no sign they plan to hand power back to civilian rule.
articles.content:
Gabon's new military leader has pledged to return the country to democracy, but has refused to provide a timelines for fresh elections. 
Gen Brice Oligui Nguema said the country's state institutions… [+2210 chars]

articles.title: Proud Boy Dominic Pezzola who stormed US Capitol jailed for 10 years - BBC
articles.description: Dominic Pezzola smashed a window at Congress during a raid the judge brands "a national disgrace".
articles.content:
